info.author: Espen Moe-Nilssen
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
===================
medialog.emailfield
===================

-------
Purpose
-------

medialog.emailfield adds a new Archetypes field for storing email fields.

What makes it special?

*  It autofills the email field with the email address of the currently authenticated member.

How do I use it?

See the example Archetype content type created in:
medialog/emailfield/contents/email.py



Changelog
=========

0.1 - Unreleased
----------------

* Initial release

Contributors:
-------------

- Espen Moe-Nilssen <espen@medialog.no>
- JC Brand <brand@syslab.com>

medialog.emailfield adds a new Archetypes field for storing email fields.

What makes it special?
